name: Tell me a Joke
description:
This project was made during October 2021, for a Game Design class.

We had to create a game following the theme : "When you understand it, the game is over".

So I won't tell you anything about how to play, as it would defeat the purpose of the project. Please tell me in the comments how much you did understand, and if you managed to complete the game

CREDITS :

Game Design : Gaëtan Piou
Programming : Gaëtan Piou
Music : Philippe-Albert Leblanc

Sprites by Dead Revolver
Tilemap by Team PixelWhale
